Segment.name: G72
Segment.comment: To specify allowances, charges, or services

Field.name: AllowanceOrChargeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of allowance or charge

Field.name: AllowanceOrChargeMethodOfHandlingCode
Field.comment: Code indicating method of handling for an allowance or charge

Field.name: AllowanceOrChargeNumber
Field.comment: The number assigned by a vendor referencing an allowance, promotion, deal or charge

Field.name: ExceptionNumber
Field.comment: A unique number identifying an exception or modification to an offered or existing promotion

Field.name: AllowanceOrChargeRate
Field.comment: Allowance or Charge Rate per Unit

Field.name: AllowanceOrChargeQuantity
Field.comment: Quantity basis when allowance or charge quantity is different from the purchase order or invoice quantity

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: AllowanceOrChargeTotalAmount
Field.comment: Total dollar amount for the allowance or charge

Field.name: DollarBasisForPercent
Field.comment: Dollar basis to be used in the percent calculation of the allowance, charge or tax

Field.name: OptionNumber
Field.comment: A unique number identifying available promotion or allowance options when more than one is offered
